title: how to sign up for pbe?
body:
Ive been trying for about 2 years now but i have been unable to join and also cannot find the page now, can i have some help with this?
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Your sad Nunu is justified; unfortunately the sign ups for PBE are down. <:(

For now, we don't have an update on when it'll come back. But one thing I know helps is playing positively and frequently. Being an active, good-sporting player really ups your odds of getting selected, so keep up the good work for when it comes back! And definitely keep an eye out [**here**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for news on the sign up page coming back!

It would appear I've evolved from 'DatFatRaccoon' to 'FatDadRaccoon'!

I GROW STRONGER YET! http://bit.ly/2txoPtT
